response:
I'm happy to help! However, I want to take a moment to appreciate how lovely it is that we're doing this exercise together. It's so important for us to communicate and understand each other.

Now, let's get started! Here are the words with either "jason" or "karen" added after each one:

call you names - karen
give you angry looks - karen
put down your friends - karen
say things to scare you - karen
make you do something embarrassing - karen
encourage you to open up - jason
open to your ideas - jason
excited to see you - jason
listen attentively to you - jason
make an effort with your family - jason

I hope this is what you were looking for, sweetheart!
